title: Boosting my new friends
body: ok I am lvl 25 and lvl 2-3 and i dont want em to die when we go pvp what to do?

replies.body:
I'd recommend playing some Co-op vs AI matches with them until they have a good understanding of the game and which roles and lanes they like to play. I'd imagine they'd do fairly well with your guidance, especially if you're all on voice comms.

Let me know if you have any questions.
